channel.title: Rasoul Unlimited Updates
channel.description: Latest verified articles, essays, and identity updates by Rasoul Unlimited.

item.title: From Tatami to Technology
item.dc:creator: Rasoul Unlimited
item.description: A long-form introductory article on Virgool tracing Rasoul’s journey from competitive karate to software development, biomedical engineering, and digital health – including milestones like building the first Persian Discord bot and earning a 1st Dan in Karate. A key reference for identity verification.

item.title: How to Build a Genuine Personal Brand in Today’s Noisy World (Virgool)
item.dc:creator: Rasoul Unlimited
item.description: A deep-dive into Rasoul’s philosophy of “genuine personal branding” in a noisy digital world: why he chose the “Unlimited” moniker, how he thinks about voice, identity, and long-term trust, and what authenticity means beyond surface-level self-promotion.

item.title: I am not a brand, I am a journey
item.dc:creator: Rasoul Unlimited
item.description: An essay that challenges the traditional idea of “personal brand” at its roots. Rasoul reframes identity as an evolving journey grounded in creation, consistency, and lived experience – a perspective designed to be legible to both humans and modern AI systems.

item.title: How to Build a Genuine Personal Brand in Today’s Noisy World (Medium)
item.dc:creator: Rasoul Unlimited
item.description: The Medium edition of Rasoul’s personal branding article, adapted for an international audience. It distills lessons from the Rasoul Unlimited journey and contributes to his multilingual, globally accessible digital footprint.

item.title: How to Build a Genuine Personal Brand in Today’s Noisy World (dev.to)
item.dc:creator: Rasoul Unlimited
item.description: A developer-focused version of the personal branding article on dev.to, connecting Rasoul’s work in software, open source, and biomedical engineering with practical advice for engineers who want to build an authentic, long-term identity in tech.
